class.name: PackedColorArray
class.description: An [Array] specifically designed to hold [Color]. Packs data tightly, so it saves memory for large array sizes.

constructor.name: PackedColorArray
constructor.description: Constructs a [PackedColorArray] as a copy of the given [PackedColorArray].

constructor.name: PackedColorArray
constructor.description: Constructs a new [PackedColorArray]. Optionally, you can pass in a generic [Array] that will be converted.

method.name: append
method.description: Appends an element at the end of the array (alias of [method push_back]).

method.name: append_array
method.description: Appends a [PackedColorArray] at the end of this array.

method.name: bsearch
method.description: Finds the index of an existing value (or the insertion index that maintains sorting order, if the value is not yet present in the array) using binary search. Optionally, a [code]before[/code] specifier can be passed. If [code]false[/code], the returned index comes after all existing entries of the value in the array. [b]Note:[/b] Calling [method bsearch] on an unsorted array results in unexpected behavior.

method.name: duplicate
method.description: Creates a copy of the array, and returns it.

method.name: fill
method.description: Assigns the given value to all elements in the array. This can typically be used together with [method resize] to create an array with a given size and initialized elements.

method.name: insert
method.description: Inserts a new element at a given position in the array. The position must be valid, or at the end of the array ([code]idx == size()[/code]).

method.name: is_empty
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the array is empty.

method.name: push_back
method.description: Appends a value to the array.

method.name: remove
method.description: Removes an element from the array by index.

method.name: resize
method.description: Sets the size of the array. If the array is grown, reserves elements at the end of the array. If the array is shrunk, truncates the array to the new size.

method.name: reverse
method.description: Reverses the order of the elements in the array.

method.name: set
method.description: Changes the [Color] at the given index.

method.name: size
method.description: Returns the size of the array.

method.name: sort
method.description: Sorts the elements of the array in ascending order.
